writer.name: 约瑟夫·恰佩克 Josef Capek

this_title: Как кошечка и собачка мыли пол
trans_title: How the Cat and the Dog Washed the Floor
Kak koshechka i sobachka myli pol
Як кошеня і песик мили підлогу(乌克兰VHS片名)
Як песик і кошеня мили підлогу(乌克兰文)
introduction: "How the cat and the dog scrubbed the floor" is a short Soviet animated film of 1977 based on the fairy tale of Josef Czapek. Having woken up in the morning, the cat and dog saw that there was a very dirty floor in their house. Not finding an improvised means for cleaning, they decide to wash the floor with the help of - each other. And this took them all day.
chinese_title: Как кошечка и собачка мыли пол
